description: Express.js route handlers for managing course requests, including listing pending requests, approving, rejecting, and removing courses with admin-only access control.

methods.name: GET /course-requests
methods.description: Fetches list of pending course requests, accessible only to admin users.

methods.name: POST /course-requests/:courseId/approve
methods.description: Approves a pending course request, updates status to 'published', and notifies the instructor.

methods.name: POST /course-requests/:courseId/reject
methods.description: Rejects a pending course request, updates status to 'rejected', and notifies the instructor with reason.

methods.name: POST /course-requests/:courseId/remove
methods.description: Removes (soft deletes) a course, updates 'deletedAt', and notifies the instructor with reason.
